|rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "GAN5.PT168A-B" and "REV1.0" appears to be silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :This device probably uses BCM6318 and BCM43131. OEM: [[SGE]] ([[T&W]]) {{See also|Sagemcom F@ST 2804 V7|Sagemcom}} ==Links of Interest== *[https://zepete.livejournal.com/94240.html ''Sagemcom F@ST 2804 V7 rev1 (1704N)'' on '''Zepete''' LJ] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== {{SCollapse|Boot log • >> |
